overview_of_class:
Quarter 2
(PHYS333-2): Electrodynamics. Faraday's law and (Maxwell's version of) Ampere's law, Maxwell equations; Potential formulation of electrodynamics; Poynting's theorem and other conservation laws in electrodynamics; Electromagnetic waves; Electromagnetic radiation.

PHYS361-0 continues advanced discussion of special relativity and electromagnetism.
name: Advanced Electricity & Magnetism
subject: PHYSICS
